mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Contract (COMPANY_ID, CONTRACT_START_DATE, CONTRACT_END_DATE) VALUES (#{Contract.companyId}, #{Contract.contractStartDate}, #{Contract.contractEndDate})
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY_ID , CONTRACT_START_DATE FROM CONTRACT WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND CONTRACT_END_DATE BETWEEN NOW() AND TIMESTAMPADD(YEAR, 1, NOW())
SELECT CONTRACT_ID , COMPANY_ID , CONTRACT_START_DATE , CONTRACT_END_DATE FROM CONTRACT
SELECT * FROM CONTRACT WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} ORDER BY CONTRACT_START_DATE DESC LIMIT 1;
